my favorite music is jimi hendrix.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I am a stay at home mom right now but in a couple of years I will be opening my own business.
That's awesome! What kind of business will you open?
I am not sure yet, but I am thinking about something in the art or music field.
That's a great idea! I love art and music.
I like to read and write. I also like to play video games.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially like science fiction and fantasy novels.
Those are my favorite genres too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, The Lord of the Rings, and the Percy Jackson series.
Those are all great books! I'm also a big fan of the Hunger Games series.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good series.
